actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to provide States with the resources needed to rid our schools of performance-enhancing drug use.
short_title: Drug Free Varsity Sports Act of 2005

summary.text: Drug Free Varsity Sports Act of 2005 - Directs the Secretary of Education, acting through the Assistant Deputy Secretary of the Office of Safe and Drug-Free Schools, to award competitive grants to state educational agencies to develop and carry out statewide pilot programs that test secondary school students for performance-enhancing drug use.

titles.title: Drug Free Varsity Sports Act of 2005
A bill to provide States with the resources needed to rid our schools of performance-enhancing drug use.
